overview: Homework can be boring enough on its own, but it’s totally impossible to focus on solving math problems or memorize historical dates when you’ve got a raging boner stabbing the inside of your pants. Watch as these young Helix academics contend with uncontrollable after-school horniness, and close their textbooks to find sweet cum-soaked relief with the help of each other’s fat swollen cocks and tight little holes. Even though the study sessions are cut short, rest assured these horny schoolboys receive an in-depth lesson in anatomy.
title: Horny Schoolboys
